title: Child's Kimono, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: stencil resist (katazome) on plain weave
description: Short, straight kimono with set-in sleeves in coarse cotton in an allover floral print in shades of light blue, gold and white on a tan ground. Hand sewn with heavy blue cotton thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Child's Kimono, late 18th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: stencil resist (katazome) on plain weave. 1956-64-14.
